Eternal Nature.quote: That which never was born and never dies. (Katha Upanishad 1.2.18)

Infinite Duration.quote: A thousand years in your sight are like a day that has just gone by. (Psalm 90:4)

Perpetual Existence.quote: Neither death nor life... neither the present nor the future... will be able to separate us. (Romans 8:38-39)

Eternal Present.quote: Time is the moving image of eternity. (Plato, Timaeus)

Timeless Truth.quote: The eternal truth remains unchanging through all changes. (Bhagavad Gita 2:16)

Eternal Return.quote: That which has been is what will be, that which is done is what will be done. (Ecclesiastes 1:9)

Everlasting Life.quote: Whoever believes in him shall have eternal life. (John 3:15)

Eternal Law.quote: The Dharma is timeless, leading onward. (Dhammapada 1)

Endless Cycle.quote: The wheel of time turns without beginning or end. (Vishnu Purana)

Eternal Mind.quote: The eternal intelligence pervades all existence. (Yoga Sutras 4.18)

Timeless Wisdom.quote: Wisdom is eternal, preceding all creation. (Proverbs 8:22-23)

Eternal Light.quote: The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it. (John 1:5)

Perpetual Motion.quote: The Tao is constant in non-action, yet everything gets done. (Tao Te Ching 37)

Timeless Beauty.quote: Beauty is eternal, only its expressions change. (Rabindranath Tagore)

Eternal Peace.quote: Peace eternal lies in the eternal silence. (Sri Aurobindo)

Endless Space.quote: Space is eternal and infinite, containing all possibilities. (Upanishads)

Eternal Spirit.quote: The Spirit is eternal, unchanging, and all-pervading. (Bhagavad Gita 2:24)

Timeless Now.quote: The eternal now contains all times. (Meister Eckhart)

Eternal Unity.quote: All multiplicity must be resolved into eternal unity. (Plotinus, Enneads)

Perpetual Renewal.quote: Behold, I make all things new. (Revelation 21:5)

Eternal Memory.quote: What has been will be remembered eternally. (Ecclesiastes 1:11)

Timeless Design.quote: The eternal patterns underlie all manifest forms. (Plato, Republic)

Eternal Order.quote: The cosmic order is eternally maintained. (Rig Veda 10.190)

Endless Potential.quote: In the eternal is infinite possibility. (Upanishads)

Eternal Presence.quote: The eternal presence dwells in the heart of all beings. (Bhagavad Gita 18:61)

Timeless Purpose.quote: The eternal purpose which he accomplished in Christ. (Ephesians 3:11)

Eternal Way.quote: The way that can be named is not the eternal way. (Tao Te Ching 1)

Endless Journey.quote: The path to the eternal is itself eternal. (Buddhist teaching)
